# This file is autogenerated
title: getUser
description: Overview of the getUser method
slug: wallets/reference/alchemy/wagmi-core/functions/getUser
---

Gets the current authenticated user's information.

Returns user details including email, phone, address, and organization ID.

## Import

```ts
import { getUser } from "@alchemy/wagmi-core";
```

## Usage

```ts
const user = getUser(config);
console.log("User address:", user.address);
console.log("User email:", user.email);
console.log("User phone:", user.phone);
```

## Parameters

### config

`Config`

- The shared Wagmi/Alchemy config

## Returns

`User`
The current user object
